recipes.title: BEEF ORZO BOWLS
recipes.author: Samantha Kinsella
recipes.description:
A Beef Orzo Bowl is a hearty and flavorful dish that combines tender beef with
orzo pasta (a rice-shaped pasta), usually served with vegetables and seasonings in
a single bowl.
recipes.ingredients: ["1 lb of Beef","2 Cups of Orzo"]
recipes.instructions:
["Orzo:
In a large pot of boiling water add orzo. Cook for 9 minutes so tender but firm.
Strain orzo and add 2 tablespoons of salted butter.
Cover!","Veggies:
Put 1 tablespoon of oil into a large pot headed over medium/high.
Add garlic and cook for 30 seconds, until you can smell it.
Add your peppers and tomatoes with pepper to taste.
Cook for 5-6 minutes then remove from pan."]

recipes.title: BEEF AND BLACK BEAN CHILLI
recipes.author: Samantha Kinsella
recipes.description:
You'll be surprised at how conveniently you can make
baked cheese bread at home.
recipes.ingredients: ["1lb of Beef","4 Sweet Potatoes","Beef Broth Concentrate 4 tablespoons"]
recipes.instructions:
["TACO SEASONING:
1 teaspoon chili powder (add more if you like)
1teaspoon garlic powder
1 teaspoon onion powder (or 2 teaspoons
crushed dried fried onions)
1⁄2 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes
1⁄2 teaspoon dried oregano
2 teaspoons paprika
1 1⁄2 teaspoons ground cumin
1⁄2 teaspoon sea salt
1⁄2 teaspoon black pepper
1pinch ground cinnamon
1pinch ground cloves
","Veggies:
Cut sweet potatoes into small 1/2 inch chunks
Toss potatoes in 1 tablespoon of oil and 1 tablespoon of Taco seasoning
Roast in oven at 425 for 20 minutes, flipping halfway through
","Beef:
Heat a large pot over medium-high and add 1 tbsp of oil then beef, cooking until
brown.
Add tomato paste and 2 more tablespoons of taco seasoning, cooking for 2
minutes until well combined
Add broth concentrate, beans and liquid, crushed tomatoes and 1/2 teaspoon of
sugar.
Reduce chili to low and simmer for 10 minutes stirring occasionally","Finale:
Stir sweet potatoes into the chili, divide into bowls and top with cheese and sour
cream!"]
